channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Jimmy Carter: Many evolutions for a centenarian ‘citizen of the world’
item.description: The 39th and longest-lived U.S. president, James Earl Carter Jr., died Sunday at the age of 100. His life ended where it began, in Plains, Georgia.

item.title: Jimmy Carter, the 39th US president, has died at 100
Significant milestones in life and career of Jimmy Carter
